name: World's Most Useless Clicker Game
description:
You know those little games where you have to click a button for hours upon hours and you actually have a goal? Well, this game is different. No goal, no autoclickers, ONLY CLICK! CLICK, CLICK CLICK, ALL DAY LONG! I might as well sing a song!

No. I will not sing a song.

Enjoy the game, for like, a minute..

HTML version: https://everlighted-games.itch.io/wmucg-html
